metadata.name: SHIP 1
metadata.description: NefariousPirateships's Token #1 represents a unique piece of a functional metal pirate art vessel, designed for creation, exploration, and repurposing. Crafted with passion and skill, this token symbolizes the boundless spirit of adventure and the shared pursuit of discovery. Each SHIP token signifies fractional ownership of the actual Nefarious Crypto vessel, allowing token holders to share in the tangible and intangible rewards of its journey.
